text: The Lancia Thesis was a car produced by Lancia from 2002 to 2009. It is a large car with retro styling, similar to the Rover 75. == Engines == * 2.0 TB 136 kW (185 hp) * 2.4 125 kW (170 hp) * 3.0 V6 158 kW (215 hp) * 3.2 V6 169 kW (230 hp) * 2.4 JTD 110 kW (150 hp) * 2.4 Multijet 125 kW (170 hp) and 136 kW (185 hp) Thesis Category:Front wheel drive vehicles Category:2000s automobiles
title: Lancia Thesis
